text: Javier Ambrois (born May 9, 1932 in Montevideo, Uruguay - died June 25, 1975 in Montevideo, Uruguay) was a Uruguayan footballer who played for clubs of Uruguay, Argentina and Brazil and the Uruguay national football team in the FIFA World Cup Switzerland 1954. He and Humberto Maschio (Argentina), were the all-time top scorers of the 1957 South American Championship, with 9 goals each. ==Teams== * Nacional 1950-1954 * Fluminense 1955 * Nacional 1955-1957 * Boca Juniors 1958-1959 * Lanus 1960 * Defensor Sporting 1962-1963 ==Titles== * Nacional 1950, 1952, 1955 and 1956 (Uruguayan Championship) * Uruguay 1956 (Copa América in Uruguay) ==External links== \+ * Category:1932 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Uruguay international footballers Category:Club Nacional de Football players Category:Defensor Sporting players Category:Boca Juniors footballers Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina Category:Copa América-winning players Category:Association football forwards Category:Club Atlético Lanús footballers Category:Fluminense FC players
title: Javier Ambrois
